descriptions.profiles: Add your social media and professional network profiles
descriptions.workExperience: Add your professional work history and achievements
descriptions.volunteer: Add your volunteer work and community contributions
descriptions.education: Add your academic background and relevant coursework
descriptions.awards: Add your awards, honors, and professional recognition
descriptions.certificates: Add your professional certificates and licenses
descriptions.publications: Add your published articles, papers, and books
descriptions.skills: Add your technical skills and areas of expertise
descriptions.languages: Add languages you speak and your proficiency levels
descriptions.interests: Add your hobbies and personal interests
descriptions.projects: Add your personal and professional projects

validation.email: Must be a valid email address
validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date
validation.minContent: Resume must have at least one of: work experience, education, or skills
validation.minSkills: At least one skill is required
validation.content_required: Please add at least one section (work experience, education, or skills) to generate your resume

errors.title: Error
errors.invalidData: Invalid resume data. Please check all fields.
errors.pdfGeneration: Failed to generate PDF. Please try again.
errors.pdfTimeout: PDF generation took too long. Please try again with simpler content.
errors.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
errors.validationError: Please correct the errors in the form.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

loading.please_wait: This will take just a moment

preview.empty_state: Start filling out the form to see your resume preview
